name: auto-coder
description: Auto-coder framework (NO AI and AI) - requirements to test artifacts generator

scripts.generate:intelligent: node -e 'const Generator = require("./src/generators/intelligent-requirements-generator"); const gen = new Generator(); gen.generateFromRequirementFile(process.argv[2]);'
scripts.test:features: cd SBS_Automation && npx cucumber-js features/ --require support/ --require steps/ --format progress-bar
scripts.test:smoke: cd SBS_Automation && npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/ --tags '@smoke'
scripts.test:critical: cd SBS_Automation && npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/ --tags '@critical'
scripts.test:generated: cd SBS_Automation && npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/ --tags '@Generated'
scripts.test:security: cd SBS_Automation && npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/ --tags '@security'
scripts.test:fit: cd SBS_Automation && cross-env ADP_ENV=fit npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/
scripts.test:iat: cd SBS_Automation && cross-env ADP_ENV=iat npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/
scripts.test:prod: cd SBS_Automation && cross-env ADP_ENV=prod npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/
scripts.test:local: cd SBS_Automation && cross-env ADP_ENV=local LOCAL_DEVELOPMENT=true npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/
scripts.test:api: cd SBS_Automation && cross-env API_ONLY_MODE=true npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/ --tags '@Category:API'
scripts.test:ui: cd SBS_Automation && cross-env UI_ONLY_MODE=true npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/ --tags 'not @Category:API'
scripts.test:parallel: cd SBS_Automation && npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/ --parallel 4
scripts.test:headless: cd SBS_Automation && cross-env HEADLESS_MODE=true npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/
scripts.test:debug: cd SBS_Automation && cross-env DEBUG_MODE=true VERBOSE_LOGGING=true npx cucumber-js features/ --require steps/ --require support/
scripts.team:setup: echo 'ðŸš€ Team Setup: Run npm install && npm run team:validate'
scripts.team:validate: node -e 'console.log("âœ… Node.js:", process.version); console.log("âœ… Framework: Ready");' && npm run framework:status
scripts.team:test: npm run generate:test && npm run deploy:dry-run
scripts.compliance:info: echo 'RULE: Auto-coder generates only, humans integrate manually'

author: Auto-Coder Framework Team
